seriesJson.title: Challenges in education
seriesJson.description: Series that presents problems facing educators today. Recent subjects have been 'The Computer in Medicine,' 'Climate for Learning,' 'Teacher Unrest,' 'Teacher Evaluation,' 'Vacuum Propulsion.'

node.title: Researching the effect of depth pressure
node.description: Program number 143 talks about an experiment in measuring the effect of water pressure on humans.

node.title: Sea floor charts
node.description: Program number 122 talks about oceanography and charts.

node.title: Tissue typing for organ transplants
node.description: Program number 141 talks about the work that goes on with organ transplants.

node.title: Tropical agriculture
node.description: Program number 134 talks about agricultural in tropical climates.

node.title: Counseling on campus
node.description: Program number 128 talks about counseling on college campuses and asks if we are too dependent on "professional problem solvers."

node.title: Engineers in medicine
node.description: Program number 137 talks about the role of the engineer in medicine.

node.title: Alcoholism
node.description: Program number 133 talks about alcoholism and the treatment of it.

node.title: Econometrics
node.description: Program number 129 talks about a new science called econometrics.

node.title: A new approach to material research
node.description: Program number 139 talks about a group of engineers that gathered to solve mutual problems, a practice that helped many research projects.

node.title: The growing menace of noise
node.description: Program number 125 talks about concerns over the problem of noise.

node.title: Duke Marine Laboratory
node.description: Program number 124 talks about the Duke Marine Laboratory.

node.title: Duke University Press
node.description: Program number 135 talks about the Duke University Press and what they produce and why.

node.title: Repairing congenital heart defects
node.description: Program number 126 talks about using technology to repair heart defects in children.

node.title: Chronic infections in children
node.description: Program number 136 talks about children who endure repeated infections.

node.title: Greek New Testament
node.description: Program number 142 talks about the search for manuscripts and the quest for more copies of the Greek New Testament.

node.title: Training nurses in gerontology
node.description: Program number 131 talks about training nurses to work with the aged.

node.title: Church attitudes toward sex education
node.description: Program number 146, a reprise of program 119, talks about increasingly positive attitudes toward sex education among Protestant churches.

node.title: Aging
node.description: Program number 123 talks about how people adjust to aging.

node.title: Economic growth in the Soviet Union
node.description: Program number 130 talks about economic growth in the Soviet Union.

node.title: Corporal Punishment
node.description: Program number 118 talks about the use of corporal punishment in schools.

node.title: Research and legal aid
node.description: Program number 147 talks about the research arm of a new legal aid clinic at Duke University.

node.title: Church attitudes toward sex education
node.description: Program number 119 talks about increasingly positive attitudes toward sex education among Protestant churches.

node.title: Church attitudes toward sex education
node.description: Program number 145, a reprise of program 119, talks about increasingly positive attitudes toward sex education among Protestant churches.

node.title: Gulf stream
node.description: Program number 127 talks about the gulf stream and oceanography.

node.title: AIESEC and exchange students
node.description: Program number 138 talks about AIESEC and the students involved in the exchange program, which promotes international business development.

node.title: Church attitudes toward sex education
node.description: Program number 120 talks about increasingly positive attitudes toward sex education among Protestant churches.

node.title: Legal aid for the poor

node.title: Perils of chronic amphetamine use
node.description: Program number 132 talks about the damages that amphetamine use can cause users.
